last_episode_to_air.name: Letty Raines, in the Mansion, With the Gun
last_episode_to_air.overview: Letty and Javier must clean up the mess Letty made, but they have to do it quickly or they will both end up in prison.

name: Good Behavior
overview: Letty Dobesh is a thief and con artist fresh out of prison whose life is always one wrong turn and bad decision from implosions — just how she likes it. But when she overhears a hitman being hired to kill a man’s wife, she sets out to derail the job, launching her on a collision course with the killer, entangling them in a dangerous and seductive relationship.

episodes.name: So You're Not an English Teacher
episodes.overview: Out of prison early for good behavior, Letty Raines is trying to be a better person. But after she overhears a hitman being hired to kill a man's wife, Letty sets out to derail the job while entangling herself in a dangerous relationship.

episodes.name: Only the Best for Mrs. Diaz
episodes.overview: Javier forces Letty to help carry out his next job by posing as his wife at an upscale resort. Letty befriends the target's wife as instructed, but when she tries to escape with the woman, her plan backfires, digging her into a much deeper hole.

episodes.name: From Terrible Me
episodes.overview: Letty and Javier are in a race against time to tie up all the loose ends of the violent crime Javier committed. Letty's parole officer lays down the law: if Letty doesn't show up to her next check-in, he will send her back to prison.

episodes.name: Your Mama Had a Hard Night
episodes.overview: Letty attempts legitimate "good behavior" when she goes back to her hometown to be close to her son. Meanwhile, while trying to protect her friend from the truth about her husband, Letty's attempt at being good explodes in her face.

episodes.name: Beautiful Things Deserve Beautiful Things
episodes.overview: Desperate to escape the mess she made, Letty rejoins Javier on the road. He's going to see his sister about the phone calls he's been getting from his family. Christian tracks Letty down, but Letty pulls him into a scheme of her own making.

episodes.name: We Pretend We're Stuck
episodes.overview: Letty returns to her hometown armed with a new plan to take custody of her son, Jacob, with Javier's help. But Letty is confronted with the stark realities of motherhood when a day with her son turns into a crisis that could send her back to prison.

episodes.name: The Ballad of Little Santino
episodes.overview: Letty and Javier attend the mysterious and explosive reunion of Javier's immediate family. Letty does her best to play the role of Javier's girlfriend while trying to find out as much as she can about Javier's past. But a tragic history unfolds right before her eyes as a newly protective Letty learns Javier's most closely-guarded secret.

episodes.name: It Still Fits Bitch
episodes.overview: Letty reverses roles with her mother when she has to bail Estelle out of jail, raising the question of who is better able to raise Jacob. Meanwhile, Jacob's birth father, Sean, shows up uninvited to a major family event.

episodes.name: For You I'd Go with Strawberry
episodes.overview: Sean's attempt at getting custody of Jacob causes Letty to falter in a weak moment that could drive a permanent wedge between her and Javier. Christian presents Letty with a legitimate opportunity to change her life.

episodes.name: All the Things
episodes.overview: Letty makes a devastating choice and once again has to clean up her own mess. But this time it's to save Javier.

episodes.name: The Heart Attack Is the Best Way
episodes.overview: With Jacob finally in their custody, Letty and Javier settle in a quaint beach town. Only, Letty is still stealing and Javier is still killing. When a hit goes wrong for Javier, and he discovers someone is trying to kill him, Letty is forced to face the reality of being in a relationship with a hitman while trying to lead a “normal” life.

episodes.name: I Want You to Leave a Person Alive for Once
episodes.overview: Javier heads out on his annual solo camping trip to commemorate the death of his baby brother. But when Letty discovers this is a lie and Javier accepted an assignment in order to provide for Letty and Jacob, she sets out to stop him. In other events, Ava’s ex-boyfriend from Argentina shows up amid unusual circumstances.

episodes.name: Because I'm Mrs. Claus
episodes.overview: When Letty and Javier go on Christmas vacation with Estelle and Rob at a hotel, the family finally bonds in a way they never have before. But a man following Estelle threatens more than just their holiday.

episodes.name: I Think it's a Sign
episodes.overview: Letty and Javier are looking at a lifetime in prison, but a confluence of bizarre circumstances just might provide them a window of opportunity to con their way out.

episodes.name: You Could Discover Me
episodes.overview: In order to buy their freedom back, Letty and Javier must work together to steal half a million dollars from the owner of a drag club. It becomes a more dangerous operation than they ever expected.

episodes.name: It's No Fun If It's Easy
episodes.overview: Letty, Javier & Jacob visit Letty's grandmother Alice to ask her for help with a $50,000 problem. But Alice, a shrewd con artist in her own right, makes Letty work for what she needs and drags Letty into her own con.

episodes.name: Don’t Thank God, Thank Me
episodes.overview: Realizing she and Javier only do damage to one another, Letty goes back to her old life, but that might be even worse. Javier will use any means necessary to get answers from the person who's been trying to kill him.

episodes.name: Stay Beautiful
episodes.overview: Javier takes on one of the strangest and most gruesome jobs he has ever done. Letty goes further down a rabbit hole until she finds herself at rock bottom.

episodes.name: And I Am a Violent Criminal
episodes.overview: Javier and Letty find their way back to each other, but the man hunting Javier is still at large, so they’re both in constant danger. Letty crosses a line she never thought she would…

episodes.name: Letty Raines, in the Mansion, With the Gun
episodes.overview: Letty and Javier must clean up the mess Letty made, but they have to do it quickly or they will both end up in prison.
